Learn

All Classes

Join the classes we have online together! We are learning Norwegian from A1-B2 level with creative PPTs. We go through important grammar and vocabulary with fun materials and intriguing lessons. This is for anyone who want to talk with each other and have fun with the learning.

The teacher

How is the teacher?

Torleif

Torleif is a driven teacher. He started teaching in 2018 after attaining his TEFL certificate in Madrid. Since starting he's had more than 100 students and +1000 classes. His teaching method is a communicative approach to make the students talking, with fun and dynamic materials the lessons are very exciting!

If you are looking for a long term solution for reaching fluency then Torleif is an ideal teacher for you. Just send him a message any time and he will help you out.
Vi snakkes senere!

Lani J.

Thanks for nice lesson every time, Torleif. I have learnt for half year. I learn norwegian with textbooks, but it is boring.His lecture is very unique , fun , simple and very useful for the real norwegian conversation . It helps me to keep motivation to learn norwegian. I am very satisfyied with his lessons.

Norwegian Language

Join single classes where you can practice conversations and grammar. It's a one-on-one session with either 30, 45 or 60-min classes. Click below and schedule a time that suits best to your timetable. Vi snakkes!
